title: Easy Vietnamese Prawn Rolls
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) rice vermicelli', '225g (8 oz) cooked, peeled prawns, cut in half lengthwise', '8 rice paper (spring roll) wrappers', '1 carrot, julienned', '1/2 head lettuce, shredded', '1 bunch basil, chopped', '100ml (4 fl oz) hoisin sauce', 'water as needed']
